name: DJ Beat'em Up!
description:
In this game prototype, you are a DJ at a party and must play your tracks, while you keep the "zombies", that come to you to ask for songs, away from your cabin.

  You move with the Left and Right keys. Hit enemies with space bar, and interact with the console with Ctrl. If enemies stay in your cabin for too long, or if you get out of the cabin for too long, you loose. You have to defeat all waves of enemies to win. You gain points by defeating enemies and by playing the console when it lights up.
